page.title: 04SCHOOLS, NE Sutton coldfield
page.content: This block is well served by six primary schools: St.Joseph's RC Combined, Moor Hall Combined, Little Sutton First, Little Sutton Middle, Coppice First and Coppice Middle. All schools have their own distinguishing uniform colours. There are inter-school competitions with schools in nearby blocks in football, cricket, netball, rugby, rounders, athletics, swimming and chess. Sutton children generally come from a fairly well-educated home back-ground. This gives them a good start in school life and standards are regarded as high. When the children reach the age of 12+ they transfer to secondary schools which are nearby.
